Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) produce electricity by electrochemically combining hydrogen and oxygen to give water.
Titulo: Preparation of Thin Films Using the Tape-Casting Process for Use in the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: They operate at high temperatures (typically 1000 degrees C) allowing natural gas (hydrogen source) to be reformed in the cell rather than in an external reformer, reducing cost.
Titulo: Preparation of Thin Films Using the Tape-Casting Process for Use in the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Comparison with current electrical power generation systems, show SOFCs to have increased efficiencies, reduced NO(x) and SO(x) emissions and improved reliability promising a viable future alternative for electricity production.
Titulo: Preparation of Thin Films Using the Tape-Casting Process for Use in the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Thin ceramic films of less than 200 mu m are necessary for reduced cell resistance.
Titulo: Preparation of Thin Films Using the Tape-Casting Process for Use in the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Tape casting is one method for production of thin ceramic (or metallic) films.
Titulo: Preparation of Thin Films Using the Tape-Casting Process for Use in the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In this paper, tape casting was used to produce both dense and porous thin films of 8-mo1% Yttria stabilised Zirconia (YSZ).
Titulo: Preparation of Thin Films Using the Tape-Casting Process for Use in the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The films were fired both separately and together in a monolithic multi-layered block in order to determine the feasibility of using this method for the production of all components of the SOFC.
Titulo: Preparation of Thin Films Using the Tape-Casting Process for Use in the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The effects of organic content, addition of pore-forming agents and firing temperature on the microstructure of the films were investigated.
Titulo: Preparation of Thin Films Using the Tape-Casting Process for Use in the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Each individual layer produced was between 40-60 mu m thick, with the highest density being >97% and the highest porosity obtained at 30% (produced by addition of a pore former).
Titulo: Preparation of Thin Films Using the Tape-Casting Process for Use in the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: No de-lamination was observed upon heating the multi-layers.
Titulo: Preparation of Thin Films Using the Tape-Casting Process for Use in the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
